name: GHB® 4726GY
description: GHB® 4726GY consists of a foamed acrylic core that is coated on both sides with high performance acrylic adhesives. This adhesive provides excellent long term holding power The tape incorporates a strong closed cell foamed core that conforms to a wide variety of substrates providing a superior bond. GHB4726GY tapes are well suited for interior and exterior applications and in many instances can replace rivets, screws,welds and liquid adhesives. This tape will bond to most dry,clean,oil free surfaces and provide bond strengths along with dynamic shear that is significantly higher than typical pressure-sensitive tapes.
